transport.question: I have wheels and carry many people, going around the city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 I often stop at designated locations.
🗺️ You can use me to get around town.
💰 You need to pay to ride me.

transport.question: I float on water, and can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I use waves to navigate.
⚓ I can carry people or cargo.
🏝️ I travel across the ocean.

transport.question: I fly through the air, and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
💺 People sit in me to travel.
✈️ I take off from an airport.

transport.question: I run on tracks, and can carry many people or goods. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special road.
📢 I often make a loud noise.
🚝 You can see me on a railway.

transport.question: I have two wheels, and you use your feet to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You need to balance to ride me.
⛑️ It's important to wear a helmet.
🏞️ You can ride me for fun or exercise.

transport.question: I am a vehicle that can fly straight up. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I have spinning blades on top.
🚨 I can be used in rescue missions.
📍 I can land in small spaces.

transport.question: I carry cars across the water, from one shore to another. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I load and unload vehicles.
🌊 I'm a type of boat.
🌉 I save you from having to go the long way around.

transport.question: I use sails to catch the wind and travel across the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ The wind powers me.
⛵ I am a boat.
🗺️ Sailors use me to explore the seas.

transport.question: I travel deep under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I explore the ocean depths.
🌊 I am a type of boat.
🔦 I need special lights to see.

transport.question: I can travel to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🪐 I explore space.

ocean.question: I'm big and blue and full of water. Boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I cover most of the Earth.
🐠 Fish swim in me.
🌊 You can surf on my waves.

ocean.question: I have a shell and live in the ocean. I'm very slow. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat seaweed.
🐌 I move very slowly.

ocean.question: I'm a big fish with sharp teeth. People are sometimes scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have many rows of teeth.
🦈 I am a predator.
🌊 I swim in the ocean and hunt for food

ocean.question: I'm a very smart sea animal that likes to play. I make clicking sounds. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I'm a mammal.
💙 I am very friendly and often help people.
🌊 I jump out of the water and do tricks.

ocean.question: I live in the ocean, but I'm not a fish. I have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change color to camouflage.
🟣 I have suckers on my arms.
🌊 I can squirt ink.

ocean.question: I'm a creature of the sea, but I look like a star. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I have five arms, but sometimes more.
💪 I can regenerate lost limbs.
🌊 I move very slowly along the seabed.

ocean.question: I am very big and blue, a mammal, and sing songs under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the largest animal on Earth.
💨 I breathe through a blowhole.
🌊 I filter feed on krill.

ocean.question: I am a tiny, colorful fish that lives in a group with lots of others in coral. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am a type of reef fish.
🤡 I have bright, vibrant colors.
🏠 I live in anemones and am immune to their sting.

ocean.question: I am a shellfish with a strong claw that lives on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🦞 I have pincers.
🔴 I turn bright red when cooked.
🚶 I walk sideways.

ocean.question: I am a long, thin fish with a snakelike body that lives in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I do not have pelvic or pectoral fins.
🌊 Some types live in coral reefs.
🌑 I can be electric.
